description: common meta info, not specific to any code

metaInfos.description: Information on a single configuration calculation which *in theory* should have no influence on the results
metaInfos.name: accessory_info_evaluation

metaInfos.description: Information on the run which *in theory* should have no influence on the results
metaInfos.name: accessory_info_run

metaInfos.description: Information on an scf iteration which *in theory* should have no influence on the results
metaInfos.name: accessory_info_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Forces on the atoms as minus gradient of energy_free_perturbative.
metaInfos.name: atom_forces_free_perturbative

metaInfos.description: Forces on the atoms as minus gradient of energy_free_scf_converged.
metaInfos.name: atom_forces_free_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: Forces on the atoms as minus gradient of energy_total_perturbative.
metaInfos.name: atom_forces_perturbative

metaInfos.description: Forces on the atoms as minus gradient of energy_total_scf_converged.
metaInfos.name: atom_forces_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: Forces on the atoms as minus gradient of energy_total_T0_perturbative.
metaInfos.name: atom_forces_T0_perturbative

metaInfos.description: Forces on the atoms as minus gradient of energy_total_T0_scf_converged.
metaInfos.name: atom_forces_T0_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: Some forces on the atoms (i.e. minus derivatives of some energy with respect to the atom position).
metaInfos.name: atom_forces_type

metaInfos.description: Number of atoms of this kind
metaInfos.name: atom_kind_natoms

metaInfos.description: Total number of atoms
metaInfos.name: atom_number

metaInfos.description: Positions of the atoms (this defines a configuration and is required).
metaInfos.name: atom_position

metaInfos.description: k band energies
metaInfos.name: band_energies

metaInfos.description: Coordinates of the k points actually building the band
metaInfos.name: band_k_points

metaInfos.description: Occupation of the k-point along the band
metaInfos.name: band_occupation

metaInfos.description: Start and end labels of the points sampled in the k-space
metaInfos.name: band_segm_labels

metaInfos.description: Coordinates of the start and end point of the segments sampled in the k-space
metaInfos.name: band_segm_start_end

metaInfos.description: l value (of the angular part given by the spherical harmonic $Y_{lm}$) of the basis function
metaInfos.name: basis_set_atom_centered_ls

metaInfos.description: number of different basis functions in this set
metaInfos.name: basis_set_atom_centered_nbasis_functions

metaInfos.description: number of different kind of basis functions in this set
metaInfos.name: basis_set_atom_centered_nkinds

metaInfos.description: Radial function of the different basis function kinds, the 5 values are $r$, $f(r)$, $f'(r)$, $f(r)*r$, $\frac{d}{dr}(f(r)*r)$ and are given by default on an equispaced grid from 0 to 4 $nm$
metaInfos.name: basis_set_atom_centered_radial_functions

metaInfos.description: Code dependent but explicative base name of the basis function, not unique. For example fhi-aims looks at the closest standard basis set, and uses that name. Details are explained in the [basis_set_atom_centered_base_name wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-lab-base/wikis/metainfo/basis-set-atom-centered-short-name), this name should not contain the atom kind (to simplify the use of a single name for multiple elements).
metaInfos.name: basis_set_atom_centered_short_name

metaInfos.description: Code dependent explicative and unique name of the basis function, it uses basis_set_atom_centered_short_name and if not equal to the default basis set implied by that name appends the first 10 characters of the base64 url encoding of the SHA-512 of the diffs stored as normalized json, details are explained in the [basis_set_atom_centered_name wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-lab-base/wikis/metainfo/basis-set-atom-centered-unique-name), this name should not contain the atom kind (to simplify the use of a single name for multiple elements).
metaInfos.name: basis_set_atom_centered_unique_name

metaInfos.description: atom number of kind of atom this basis set is thought for (0 means unspecified, or a pseudo atom)
metaInfos.name: basis_set_atom_kind_number

metaInfos.description: A cell_associated basis set type, string should be as defined in the [basis_set_cell_associated_kind wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-lab-base/wikis/metainfo/basis-set-cell-associated-kind).
metaInfos.name: basis_set_cell_associated_kind

metaInfos.description: A descriptive name identifying the basis set be as defined in the [basis_set_cell_associated_name wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-lab-base/wikis/metainfo/basis-set-cell-associated-name).
metaInfos.name: basis_set_cell_associated_name

metaInfos.description: A basis set description
metaInfos.name: basis_set_description

metaInfos.description: String describing the kind of basis set (its use, for example wavefunction). The values are described in the [basis_set_kind wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-lab-base/wikis/metainfo/basis-set-kind).
metaInfos.name: basis_set_kind

metaInfos.description: String identifying the basis set in an unique way. The values are described in the [basis_set_name wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-lab-base/wikis/metainfo/basis-set-name).
metaInfos.name: basis_set_name

metaInfos.description: Spherical cutoff for a plane wave basis set in reciprocal space, as energy of the highest plane wave ($\frac{\hbar^2|k+G|^2}{2m_e}$, constants to check!) kept into the basis. Note that normally the basis set is used for the wavefunctions, and the density would have 4 times the cutoff, but this actually depends on the use of the basis set by the method.
metaInfos.name: basis_set_plan_wave_cutoff

metaInfos.description: String identifying in an unique way the basis set used for the final wavefunctions calculated with XC_method_scf. It should refer (and be the same) to some basis_set_name which is described in the [basis_set_name wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-lab-base/wikis/metainfo/basis-set-name).
metaInfos.name: basis_set

metaInfos.description: Cell (lattice vectors). The first index is x,y,z and the second index the lattice vector.
metaInfos.name: cell

metaInfos.description: Properties actually defining the current configuration
metaInfos.name: configuration_core

metaInfos.description:
Which of the lattice vectors use periodic boundary conditions.
    A value is valid from the definition point for all subsequent values until redefined
    (i.e. if not changing it can be defined just once at the beginning).
metaInfos.name: configuration_periodic_dimensions

metaInfos.description: A quantity that is preserved during the time propagation (for example, kinetic+potential energy during NVE)
metaInfos.name: conserved_quantity

metaInfos.description: Number of eigenvalues
metaInfos.name: eigenvalues_eigenvalues_number

metaInfos.description: Values of the eigenvalues
metaInfos.name: eigenvalues_eigenvalues

metaInfos.description: A short string describing the kind of eigenvalues, as defined in the [eigenvalues_kind wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-lab-base/wikis/metainfo/eigenvalues-kind).
metaInfos.name: eigenvalues_kind

metaInfos.description: number of kpoints
metaInfos.name: eigenvalues_kpoints_number

metaInfos.description: kpoints on which the eigenvalues were evaluated
metaInfos.name: eigenvalues_kpoints

metaInfos.description: Occupation of that eigenfunction
metaInfos.name: eigenvalues_occupation

metaInfos.description: Electronic kinetic energy at a single scf iteration
metaInfos.name: electronic_kinetic_energy_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Electronic kinetic energy
metaInfos.name: electronic_kinetic_energy

metaInfos.description: Component of the correlation (C) energy at the (Meta)GGA level using the self-consistent density of the target functional (no exact exchange mixin, full unscaled value)
metaInfos.name: energy_C_mGGA

metaInfos.description: Correlation (C) energy using XC_functional_perturbative
metaInfos.name: energy_C_perturbative

metaInfos.description: Converged correlation (C) energy using XC_functional_scf
metaInfos.name: energy_C_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: At each scf iteration, change of total energy with respect to the previous scf iteration
metaInfos.name: energy_change_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Type of the shifted total energy that should be more comparable among different codes, numerical settings, ... Details can be found on https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaInfo/Energy_Comparable.
metaInfos.name: energy_comparable_type

metaInfos.description: Value of the shifted total energy that should be more comparable among different codes, numerical settings, ... Details can be found on https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaInfo/Energy_Comparable.
metaInfos.name: energy_comparable_value

metaInfos.description: An energy component per atom during scf
metaInfos.name: energy_component_per_atom_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: A final value of an energy component per atom
metaInfos.name: energy_component_per_atom

metaInfos.description: An energy component of the non final, non converged energy, expected to be an extensive property
metaInfos.name: energy_component_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: A final value of an energy component, expected to be an extensive property.
metaInfos.name: energy_component

metaInfos.description: Entropy correction, to have a potential energy that compensates the changes in occupation, so that forces at finite T do not need to keep the change of occupation in account. Value during the SCF cycle.
metaInfos.name: energy_correction_entropy_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Entropy correction, to have a potential energy that compensates the changes in occupation, so that forces at finite T do not need to keep the change of occupation in account.
metaInfos.name: energy_correction_entropy

metaInfos.description: Correction to the density-density electrostatic energy in the sum of eigenvalues (that uses the mixed density on one side), and the fully consistend density-density electrostatic energy during the scf iterations
metaInfos.name: energy_correction_hartree_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Correction to the density-density electrostatic energy in the sum of eigenvalues (that uses the mixed density on one side), and the fully consistend density-density electrostatic energy
metaInfos.name: energy_correction_hartree

metaInfos.description: Converged Mp2 energy correction
metaInfos.name: energy_correction_MP2

metaInfos.description: Total electostatic energy (atom + electrons) during the scf itrations
metaInfos.name: energy_electrostatic_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Total electostatic energy (atom + electrons)
metaInfos.name: energy_electrostatic

metaInfos.description: Free energy (whose minimum gives a density with smeared occupation) calculated with XC_method_scf per atom
metaInfos.name: energy_free_per_atom_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: Free energy (whose minimum gives a density with smeared occupation) calculated with XC_method_scf per atom during the scf iterations
metaInfos.name: energy_free_per_atom_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Free energy (electronic + ions) (whose minimum gives the smeared occupation density) calculated with the method described in XC_method_perturbative
metaInfos.name: energy_free_perturbative

metaInfos.description: Free energy (whose minimum gives the smeared occupation for the density) calculated with XC_method_scf
metaInfos.name: energy_free_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: Free energy (whose minimum gives the smeared occupation for the density) calculated with XC_method_scf during the scf iterations
metaInfos.name: energy_free_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Error in the hartree (electrostatic) potential energy during the scf iterations
metaInfos.name: energy_hartree_error_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Error in the hartree (electrostatic) potential energy
metaInfos.name: energy_hartree_error

metaInfos.description: Scaled (depending on the mix paramenter of the functional) exact exchange energy
metaInfos.name: energy_hartree_fock_X_scaled

metaInfos.description: Converged exact exchange energy (not scaled)
metaInfos.name: energy_hartree_fock_X

metaInfos.description: Sum of the eigenvalues of the hamiltonian matrix defined by XC_method_scf per atom
metaInfos.name: energy_sum_eigenvalues_per_atom_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: Sum of the eigenvalues of the hamiltonian matrix defined by XC_method_scf per atom during the scf iterations.
metaInfos.name: energy_sum_eigenvalues_per_atom_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Sum of the eigenvalues of the hamiltonian matrix defined by XC_method_scf
metaInfos.name: energy_sum_eigenvalues_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: Sum of the eigenvalues of the hamiltonian matrix defined by XC_method_scf during the scf iterations.
metaInfos.name: energy_sum_eigenvalues_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Total energy using XC_method_perturbative per atom extapolated for T=0
metaInfos.name: energy_T0_per_atom_perturbative

metaInfos.description: Total energy using XC_method_scf per atom extapolated for T=0
metaInfos.name: energy_T0_per_atom_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: Converged total MP2 energy (XC_method_scf + MP2 correction)
metaInfos.name: energy_total_MP2

metaInfos.description: Total energy (electronic + ions) calculated with the method described in XC_method_perturbative
metaInfos.name: energy_total_perturbative

metaInfos.description: A final value of a total potential energy per atom during the scf
metaInfos.name: energy_total_potential_per_atom_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: A final value of a total potential energy per atom
metaInfos.name: energy_total_potential_per_atom

metaInfos.description: A final value of a total potential energy during the scf. Different total energies might have different 0, and so might not be directly comparable.
metaInfos.name: energy_total_potential_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: A final value of a total potential energy. Different total energies might have different 0, and so might not be directly comparable.
metaInfos.name: energy_total_potential

metaInfos.description: A total (final, converged) energy calculated with XC_method_scf
metaInfos.name: energy_total_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: Total electronic energy calculated with XC_method_scf during the scf iterations
metaInfos.name: energy_total_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Total energy using XC_method_scf per atom extapolated for T=0
metaInfos.name: energy_total_T0_per_atom_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: Total energy using XC_method_scf per atom extapolated for T=0 during the scf iterations
metaInfos.name: energy_total_T0_per_atom_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Total energy (or equivalently free energy), electronic + ions, calculated with the method described in XC_method_perturbative and extrapolated for T=0 (for metals)
metaInfos.name: energy_total_T0_perturbative

metaInfos.description: Total energy (or equivalently free energy) calculated with XC_method_scf extrapolated for T=0 (for metals)
metaInfos.name: energy_total_T0_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: Total energy (or equivalently free energy) calculated with XC_method_scf extrapolated for T=0 during the scf iterations
metaInfos.name: energy_total_T0_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Some correlation (C) energy.
metaInfos.name: energy_type_C

metaInfos.description: Some kind of converged van der Waals energy
metaInfos.name: energy_type_van_der_Waals

metaInfos.description: Some exchange-correlation (XC) energy.
metaInfos.name: energy_type_XC

metaInfos.description: Some exchange (X) energy.
metaInfos.name: energy_type_X

metaInfos.description: Method used to compute the van der Waals energy stored in energy_van_der_Waals_value
metaInfos.name: energy_van_der_Waals_kind

metaInfos.description: Converged van der Waals energy calculated using the method described in van_der_Waals_treatment_perturbative
metaInfos.name: energy_van_der_Waals_perturbative

metaInfos.description: Converged van der Waals energy calculated using the method described in van_der_Waals_treatment_scf
metaInfos.name: energy_van_der_Waals_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: Some value of van der Waals energy calculated with the method described in energy_van_der_Waals_kind
metaInfos.name: energy_van_der_Waals_value

metaInfos.description: Component of the exchange (X) energy at the (Meta)GGA level using the self consistent density of the target functional, scaled accordingly to the mixing parameter
metaInfos.name: energy_X_mGGA_scaled

metaInfos.description: Component of the exchange (X) energy at the (Meta)GGA level using the self consistent density of the target functional (no exact exchange mixing, full unscaled value)
metaInfos.name: energy_X_mGGA

metaInfos.description: Exchange (X) energy using XC_functional_perturbative
metaInfos.name: energy_X_perturbative

metaInfos.description: Converged exchange (X) energy using XC_functional_scf
metaInfos.name: energy_X_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: Exchange correlation (XC) energy calculated with XC_functional_perturbative
metaInfos.name: energy_XC_perturbative

metaInfos.description: Exchange Correlation (XC) potential energy: the integral of the first order functional derivative of XC_functional_scf, integral v_xc*electron_density, i.e. the component of XC that is in the sum of the eigenvalues. Typically DFT only. Value associated with the configuration, should be the most converged value.
metaInfos.name: energy_XC_potential_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: Exchange Correlation (XC) potential energy: the integral of the first order functional derivative of the XC_functional_scf, integral v_xc*electron_density, i.e. the component of xc that is in the sum of the eigenvalues. Typically DFT only. Value during the SCF cycle (not converged)
metaInfos.name: energy_XC_potential_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Final exchange correlation (XC) energy calculated with XC_method_scf
metaInfos.name: energy_XC_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: XC energy (integral of e_xc in the DFT case) during the scf iterations using XC_functional_scf
metaInfos.name: energy_XC_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Some energy value
metaInfos.name: energy

metaInfos.description: Some estimate of a quantity contributing to the error of the perturbative values
metaInfos.name: error_estimate_partial_perturbative

metaInfos.description: Some estimate of a quantity contributing to the error of the final values at self consistency level
metaInfos.name: error_estimate_partial_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: Some estimate of the a quantity contibuting to the error on the energy during the scf
metaInfos.name: error_estimate_partial_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Some estimate of the error on the converged (final) value
metaInfos.name: error_estimate

metaInfos.description: Method used to calculate the extra_stress_tensor (numeric or analytic)
metaInfos.name: extra_stress_tensor_method

metaInfos.description: Setting used to calculate the extra_stress_tensor
metaInfos.name: extra_stress_tensor_setting

metaInfos.description: Extra stress tensor
metaInfos.name: extra_stress_tensor

metaInfos.description: A debugging message of the computational program, associated with a single configuration calculation
metaInfos.name: message_debug_evaluation

metaInfos.description: A debugging message of the computational program, associated with a run
metaInfos.name: message_debug_run

metaInfos.description: A debugging message of the computational program
metaInfos.name: message_debug

metaInfos.name: message_error_evaluation

metaInfos.name: message_error_run

metaInfos.description: An error message of the computational program
metaInfos.name: message_error

metaInfos.name: message_info_evaluation

metaInfos.name: message_info_run

metaInfos.description: An information message of the computational program
metaInfos.name: message_info

metaInfos.name: message_warning_evaluation

metaInfos.description: A warning message of the computational program, associated with a run
metaInfos.name: message_warning_run

metaInfos.description: A warning message of the computational program
metaInfos.name: message_warning

metaInfos.description: number of k point segments
metaInfos.name: n_k_point_segments

metaInfos.description: number of k points in each segment
metaInfos.name: n_k_points_per_segment

metaInfos.description: Hosts that did run this simulation, this is a mapping, host->json value that might give extra program dependent information on how that host is used
metaInfos.name: parallel_tasks_assignement

metaInfos.description: Number of parallel tasks used
metaInfos.name: parallel_tasks_number

metaInfos.description: Information on the parallelization of the program
metaInfos.name: parallelization_info_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Information on the parallelization of the program
metaInfos.name: parallelization_info

metaInfos.description: A debugging message of the parsing program, associated with a single configuration calculation
metaInfos.name: parsing_message_debug_evaluation

metaInfos.description: A debugging message of the parsing program, associated with a run
metaInfos.name: parsing_message_debug_run

metaInfos.description: A debugging message of the parsing program
metaInfos.name: parsing_message_debug

metaInfos.description: An error message of the parsing program, associated with a single configuration calculation
metaInfos.name: parsing_message_error_evaluation

metaInfos.description: An error message of the parsing program, associated with a run
metaInfos.name: parsing_message_error_run

metaInfos.description: An error message of the parsing program
metaInfos.name: parsing_message_error

metaInfos.description: An information message of the parsing program, associated with a a single configuration calculation
metaInfos.name: parsing_message_info_evaluation

metaInfos.description: An information message of the parsing program, associated with a run
metaInfos.name: parsing_message_info_run

metaInfos.description: An information message of the parsing program
metaInfos.name: parsing_message_info

metaInfos.description: A warning message of the parsing program
metaInfos.name: parsing_message_warning_evaluation

metaInfos.description: A warning message of the parsing program, associated with a run
metaInfos.name: parsing_message_warning_run

metaInfos.description: A warning message of the parsing program
metaInfos.name: parsing_message_warning

metaInfos.description: Post Hartree-Fock method in standarized form. This is not fully unique. Some of the methods are: full-CI; CCS,CCS(D), CCSD, CCSD(T), CCSDT(Q)...; MP2, MP3, MP4,...; GW; MCSCF,CASSCF,CASPT2,MRCISD. The list should be extended or improved in particular with respect to the multi reference or local methods. If the value is absent or '' then no post hartree_fock method has been used.
metaInfos.name: post_hartree_fock_method

metaInfos.description: Program compilation date and time as seconds from unix epoch (00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970) in seconds. Default to GMT timezone for date and times without timezone.
metaInfos.name: program_compilation_datetime

metaInfos.description: Host on which the program was compiled
metaInfos.name: program_compilation_host

metaInfos.description: Information on the program that generated the data
metaInfos.name: program_info

metaInfos.description: Name of the program that generated the data
metaInfos.name: program_name

metaInfos.description: Version of the program that was used. Should contain either the official version name or the referenze hashtag of a git repository as well as the location of the repository.
metaInfos.name: program_version

metaInfos.description: Short string describing the relativity treatment used for the calculation of the final energy and related quantities. No special treatment if skipped or empty. Relativity treatment strings are described on the [relativity_treatment wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-lab-base/wikis/metainfo/relativity-treatment).
metaInfos.name: relativity_treatment_perturbative

metaInfos.description: Short string describing the relativity treatment used during the self consitency cycle (and thus valid for the self consistent density. No special treatment if skipped or empty. Relativity treatment strings are described on the [relativity_treatment_scf wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-lab-base/wikis/metainfo/relativity-treatment).
metaInfos.name: relativity_treatment_scf

metaInfos.description: If this run was terminated properly. If false the run might have been killed or ended with an error
metaInfos.name: run_clean_end

metaInfos.description: number of scf iterations at Dft level
metaInfos.name: scf_dft_number_of_iterations

metaInfos.description: Information on the scf procedure
metaInfos.name: scf_info

metaInfos.description: Every section_atom_kind_ref refers to a section_atom_kind by using the same unique string.
metaInfos.name: section_atom_kind_ref

metaInfos.description: Every section_atom_kind contains information about a different kind of atom, and is identified by a unique string.
metaInfos.name: section_atom_kind

metaInfos.description: Every section_atom_ref refers to a section_atom by its index within the atom kind.
metaInfos.name: section_atom_ref

metaInfos.description: Every section_atom represents an atom (atom, ghost,...).
metaInfos.name: section_atom

metaInfos.description: Description of one or a sub group of basis function in this basis set
metaInfos.name: section_basis_functions_atom_centered

metaInfos.description: Total number of basis functions (some might need complex coefficients).
metaInfos.name: section_basis_nbasis_functions

metaInfos.description: Atom centered part of the basis set (assignement atom -> basis set)
metaInfos.name: section_basis_set_atom_centered_mapping

metaInfos.description: An atom centered basis set
metaInfos.name: section_basis_set_atom_centered

metaInfos.description: Global, i.e. non atom specific (non atom-centered), part of the basis set
metaInfos.name: section_basis_set_cell_associated_mapping

metaInfos.description: A cell_associated (atom independent) basis set
metaInfos.name: section_basis_set_cell_associated

metaInfos.description: Represents a concrete basis set instatiated with parameters given in the section_method for the system section_system_description.
metaInfos.name: section_basis_set

metaInfos.description: groups eigenvalues of different spins
metaInfos.name: section_eigenvalues_group

metaInfos.description: eigenvalues of some energy for one spin channel
metaInfos.name: section_eigenvalues

metaInfos.description: A shifted total energy that should be more comparable among different codes, numerical settings, ... Details can be found on https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaInfo/Energy_Comparable.
metaInfos.name: section_energy_comparable

metaInfos.description: Section containing some van der Waals energy value
metaInfos.name: section_energy_van_der_Waals

metaInfos.description: Section to keep extra stress tensors that have been calculated
metaInfos.name: section_extra_stress_tensor

metaInfos.description: section collecting the information on a k band evaluation
metaInfos.name: section_k_band

metaInfos.description: Every section_method section contains the various parameters that define the theory used and he approximations done (convergence thresholds,...)
metaInfos.name: section_method

metaInfos.description: Every section_run represents a single call of a program. What exactly is contained in a run depends on the run type and the program.
metaInfos.name: section_run

metaInfos.description: Every section_scf_iteration section represents an scf iteration
metaInfos.name: section_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Every section_single_configuration_calculation section contains the values computated or evaluated during a single configuration calculation.
metaInfos.name: section_single_configuration_calculation

metaInfos.description: Every section_system_description section contains the properties required to describe the Physical system simulated: the given atomic configuration, if relevant the periodic cell, extenal potentials,...
metaInfos.name: section_system_description

metaInfos.description: Short string for the self interaction correction (SIC) treatment used to calculate the final energy and related quantities. No special treatment if skipped or empty. Other SIC treatment strings as described on the [self\_interaction\_correction wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-lab-base/wikis/metainfo/self-interaction-correction).
metaInfos.name: self_interaction_correction_perturbative

metaInfos.description: Short string for the self interaction (SIC) treatment used during the self consistency cicle (and thus valid for the self consitent density). No special treatment if skipped or empty. Other SIC treatment strings as described on the [self\_interaction\_correction wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-lab-base/wikis/metainfo/self-interaction-correction).
metaInfos.name: self_interaction_correction_scf

metaInfos.description: parameters of one atom kind
metaInfos.name: settings_atom_kind

metaInfos.description: Coupled Clusters method parameters
metaInfos.name: settings_coupled_cluster

metaInfos.description: GW method parameters
metaInfos.name: settings_GW

metaInfos.description: Multi-configurational self-consistent field method parameters
metaInfos.name: settings_MCSCF

metaInfos.description: Parameters that control the simulation and are in the method section
metaInfos.name: settings_method

metaInfos.description: Møller–Plesset perturbation theory parameters
metaInfos.name: settings_moller_plesset_perturbation_theory

metaInfos.description: Multireference single and double configuration interaction method parameters
metaInfos.name: settings_multi_reference

metaInfos.description: Parameters connected with defining the exchange correlation (XC) treatment for a perturbative energy, using as starting point the scf method
metaInfos.name: settings_perturbative_method

metaInfos.description: Post hartree fock method parameters
metaInfos.name: settings_post_hartree_fock

metaInfos.description: Parameters and information connected with the relativity treatment used in the calculation
metaInfos.name: settings_relativity_treatment

metaInfos.description: Parameters connected with defining the exchange correlation (XC) treatment during the self consisten cycle and thus valid for the self consistent density.
metaInfos.name: settings_scf_method

metaInfos.description: Parameters and information connected with self interaction correction (SIC) method used
metaInfos.name: settings_self_interaction_correction

metaInfos.description: Parameters that control the simulation
metaInfos.name: settings_simulation

metaInfos.description: Method parameters that control single configuration calculation. This covers things like the theory level, but not the temperature of an molecular dynamics.
metaInfos.name: settings_single_configuration_method

metaInfos.description: Parameters and information connected with the van der Waals treatment used in the calculation
metaInfos.name: settings_van_der_Waals_treatment

metaInfos.description: Parameters connected with defining the exchange correlation (XC) functional
metaInfos.name: settings_XC_functional

metaInfos.description: References to the source of the data (uri,...)
metaInfos.name: source_references

metaInfos.description: Value of the total spin moment operator $S^2$ for the converged wavefunctions calculated with the XC_method_scf, which can be used to calculate the spin contamination in spin unrestricted calculations.
metaInfos.name: spin_S2_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: Value of the total spin moment operator $S^2$ during the scf iterations of XC_method_scf. Can be used to calculate the spin contamination in spin unrestricted calculations.
metaInfos.name: spin_S2_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Method used to calculate the stress_tensor_perturbative (numeric or analytic), i.e., using the perturbative energy and orbitals
metaInfos.name: stress_tensor_method_perturbative

metaInfos.description: Method used to calculate the stress_tensor_scf (numeric or analytic), i.e., using scf converged energy and orbitals
metaInfos.name: stress_tensor_method_scf

metaInfos.description: A final value of the default stress tensor of energy_total_scf calculated with stress_tensor_setting_scf
metaInfos.name: stress_tensor_scf_converged

metaInfos.description: Setting to calculate stress_tensor_perturbative, i.e., using the perturbative energy and orbitals
metaInfos.name: stress_tensor_setting_perturbative

metaInfos.description: Setting to calculate stress_tensor_scf, i.e., using scf converged energy and orbitals
metaInfos.name: stress_tensor_setting_scf

metaInfos.description: A final value of a stress tensor
metaInfos.name: stress_tensor_type

metaInfos.description: A final value of the default stress tensor of energy_total calculated with stress_tensor_setting
metaInfos.name: stress_tensor

metaInfos.description: Target value of the s quantum number, which implies a $s*(s+1)$ value for $S^2$. It is a multiple of $1/2$. This value is not necessarily enforced
metaInfos.name: target_spin_quantum_number

metaInfos.description: Information on single configuration calculation date, and timings
metaInfos.name: time_info_evaluation

metaInfos.description: Information on run date, and run timings
metaInfos.name: time_info_run

metaInfos.description: Information on scf iteration date, and timings
metaInfos.name: time_info_scf_iteration

metaInfos.description: Wall time needed for an MP2 calculation
metaInfos.name: time_MP2

metaInfos.description: End time of the run on CPU 1
metaInfos.name: time_run_cpu1_end

metaInfos.description: Start time of the run on CPU 1
metaInfos.name: time_run_cpu1_start

metaInfos.description: End date of run stored as time since the unix epoch (00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970) in seconds
metaInfos.name: time_run_date_end

metaInfos.description: Start date of the run stored as time since the unix epoch (00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970) in seconds
metaInfos.name: time_run_date_start

metaInfos.description: Internal wall clock time at the end of the run
metaInfos.name: time_run_wall_end

metaInfos.description: Internal wall clock time at the start of the run
metaInfos.name: time_run_wall_start

metaInfos.description: End time of an scf iteration on CPU 1
metaInfos.name: time_scf_iteration_cpu1_end

metaInfos.description: Start time of an scf iteration on CPU 1
metaInfos.name: time_scf_iteration_cpu1_start

metaInfos.description: End date of scf stored as time since the unix epoch (00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970) in seconds
metaInfos.name: time_scf_iteration_date_end

metaInfos.description: Start date of an scf iteration stored as time since the unix epoch (00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970) in seconds
metaInfos.name: time_scf_iteration_date_start

metaInfos.description: Internal wall clock time at the end of an scf iteration
metaInfos.name: time_scf_iteration_wall_end

metaInfos.description: Internal wall clock time at the start of an scf iteration
metaInfos.name: time_scf_iteration_wall_start

metaInfos.description: End time of the single configuration calculation on CPU 1
metaInfos.name: time_single_configuration_calculation_cpu1_end

metaInfos.description: Start time of the single configuration calculation on CPU 1
metaInfos.name: time_single_configuration_calculation_cpu1_start

metaInfos.description: End date of the single configuration calculation stored as time since the unix epoch (00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970) in seconds. Default to GMT timezone for date and times without timezone.
metaInfos.name: time_single_configuration_calculation_date_end

metaInfos.description: Start date of the single configuration calculation stored as time since the unix epoch (00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970) in seconds. Default to GMT timezone for date and times without timezone.
metaInfos.name: time_single_configuration_calculation_date_start

metaInfos.description: Internal wall clock time at the end of the single configuration calculation
metaInfos.name: time_single_configuration_calculation_wall_end

metaInfos.description: Internal wall clock time at the start of the single configuration calculation
metaInfos.name: time_single_configuration_calculation_wall_start

metaInfos.description: Short string describing the perturbative van der Waals treatment. No treatement if skipped or empty. Van der Waals treatement strings are described on the [van\_der\_Waals\_treatment wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-lab-base/wikis/metainfo/van-der-Waals-treatment).
metaInfos.name: van_der_Waals_treatment_perturbative

metaInfos.description: Short string describing the van der Waals treatment during the self consitency cycle (and thus valid for the self consistent density). No treatement if skipped or empty. Van der Waals treatement strings are described on the [van\_der\_Waals\_treatment wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-lab-base/wikis/metainfo/van-der-Waals-treatment).
metaInfos.name: van_der_Waals_treatment_scf

metaInfos.description: Exchange correlation (XC) functional used for the final energy and related quantities in a unique short form as described in the [XC\_functional wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-lab-base/wikis/metainfo/XC-functional).
metaInfos.name: XC_functional_perturbative

metaInfos.description: Exchange correlation (XC) functional used during the scf cycle (and thus for the density) in a unique short form as described in the [XC\_functional wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-lab-base/wikis/metainfo/XC-functional).
metaInfos.name: XC_functional_scf

metaInfos.description: Exchange correlation (XC) method used for the perturbative energy and related quantities in standarized short form, this string ignores convergence settings, and might collapse several similar methods. Built joining *only* the values that are different from their self consistent (sc) values in the following order: post_hartree_fock_method '_' XC_functional_perturbative '_' self_interaction_correction_perturbative '_' van_der_Waals_perturbative '_' relativity_treatment_perturbative '@' XC_method_scf. With empty strings the connecting character is skipped.
metaInfos.name: XC_method_perturbative

metaInfos.description: String that represents the perturbative exchange correlation (XC) treatment in a unique short form. This string keeps in account all settings in settings_XC. It is built from XC_method_perturbative plus '_' and the first 10 characters of the base64 url encoding of SHA 512 checksum of a normalized json with all settings_XC exluding this one
metaInfos.name: XC_method_perturbative_unique

metaInfos.description: Exchange correlation (XC) method used during the self consitency cycle and thus valid for the self consistent density. This string ignores convergence settings, and might collapse several similar methods. Built joining XC_functional_scf '_' self_iteraction_correction_scf '_' van_der_Waals_scf '_' relativity_treatment_scf. For empty strings the connecting character is skipped.
metaInfos.name: XC_method_scf

metaInfos.description: String that represents the scf exchange correlation (XC) treatment in a unique short form. This string keeps in account all settings in settings_XC. It is built from XC_method_scf plus '_' and the first 10 characters of the base64 url encoding of SHA 512 checksum of a normalized json with all settings_XC exluding this one
metaInfos.name: XC_method_scf_unique
